page.title: 17RECREATION IN CALLANDER
page.content: The recreational facilities in Callander are many and varied for tourists and locals alike. For the energetic there is tennis,badminton and squash.There is an 18 hole golf course,a bowling green canoeing on the River Teith,rock climbing on the Crags,hill walking and orienteering.Various groups have the use of the school pool.Many people swim in the river.The salmon and trout fishing give much pleasure to man and boy alike. The locals enjoy gardening,strolling along the many pleasant walks and birdwatching.Wildlife may be observed through binoculars or the local junior football team may be cheered on at the park.For the more socially minded there are frequent dances discos and ceilidhs.
